title: Have scientists studied astral projection? - Quora

response.answer_text: Scientists studied it. Results are sparse, but they got some comfirmation. Scientifically checking astral projection is equivalent to checking the ESP which happen in theses situation, against the physical fact. I could do that once myself, and some science studies did. Astral projection (scientifically called OBE, Out of Body Experience) happen as an extension of sleep paralysis (the so-called «alien abduction») and it is a common occurence in the first stage of the NDE. Check my page on scientific evidences of parapsychology, for more links to experiments and groups. Maintream science does not study or recognise parapsychology. Yet there are some units here and there, like in the Universié du Mirail in Toulouse. Some extremists, that I call scientistists (scientistes in French), deny parapsychology, and spam wikipedia with false science like the scandium fires in Hessdalen, or the NDE being neuromediator fireworks.
